quotes: Kira Radinsky has served as a Non-Executive Director since 2024.
co-founded San Francisco based SalesPredict in 2012
When SalesPredict was sold to eBay in 2016, Ms. Radinsky became eBay’s director of data science and IL chief scientist.

organizations.name: Diagnostic Robotics
quotes: She is the Chief Executive Officer and Chairwoman of Diagnostic Robotics, a US-based technology business working in the field of AI to make healthcare better, cheaper and more widely available.

organizations.name: Mana Bio
quotes: she founded Mana Bio, an AI-based drug delivery business

organizations.name: Technion
quotes: Ms. Radinsky is a visiting professor at the Technion focusing her research on how web dynamics and knowledge can help predict future global events.

organizations.name: Technion, the Israel Institute of Technology
quotes: Ms. Radinsky has a B.Sc. and a Ph.D in Computer Science from Technion, the Israel Institute of Technology.
